name: Skeleguns (chavalo)
description:
Skeleguns was made on MAD Game Jam by me and 2 more members.

I programmed and did the main menu art. Rest of the code was made by Catarina Lopes and Art by Inês Lima.

Made to be played by 2. 

Use PS4 controllers!

  • Left Analog - Walk
  • X - Jump
  • R2 - Shoot

You use a gravity gun to try to knock your opponent off the map. 

As the game progresses, power-ups will spawn randomly and can do one of four things to your gun:

  • Repulse (Default)
  • Attract
  • Increase gravity
  • Decrease gravity (it can make you go upside-down!)
